data.name: FreeStyleFootball - Dirk Package
data.detailed_description:
Special Character Dirk Package

The following items are included:
• Special Character Dirk
• 30,000 Points
• XP which is equal to Level 40


Note
Poistion of Dirk is limited to FW and its secondary positions.
Dirk is outstanding physically, that he can block the movements of opponent stricker.


How to use
DLC items will be sent to your mailbox when purchased.
As you use DLC package item from item locker, you will receive 30,000 points instantly.
XP is included in the character item. It will be automatically used as you create the character.

English*, French, German

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: window XP
  • Processor: P4 2.8GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 6200
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Generic Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: window 7
  • Processor: P4 3.4GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 7600GT
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Generic Sound Card
